p: Phase identification and purity were determined on an STADI P (Stoe & Cie.) equipped with a curved Ge‐monochromator using Mo‐ Kα 1 radiation ( λ=70.932 pm) and with a Dectris Mythen 1 K detector at room temperature. The program package Topas‐Academics v.5 was used for all Rietveld refinements. 32
